attributes.action: Abolish the charge for having a photo renewed on the driving licence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why is it that a driver should be charged £17.50p because the DVLA decide that your photo has expired.

When the paper licence lasts until you are seventy, with no charge.

It seams stupid that the licence is valid for a good forty years however the picture runs out in fourteen years and you are no longer valid to drive and could be fined £1000.

If you think this is another stealth tax and a two tier system then have your say and don't pay.
